org.forgerock.openam.oauth2

Class OAuth2GlobalSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.oauth2.OAuth2GlobalSettings

  • public class OAuth2GlobalSettings
extends Object
    Methods of this class return Global settings of the OAuth2 Provider.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OAuth2GlobalSettings(Debug logger, PrivilegedAction<SSOToken> adminTokenProvider, ServiceListeners serviceListeners)

      The interval at which to poll for changes to the token blacklist.

      • OAuth2GlobalSettings

public OAuth2GlobalSettings(@Named(value="OAuth2Provider")

                                    PrivilegedAction<SSOToken> adminTokenProvider,

    • Method Detail

      • isSessionBlacklistingEnabled

        public boolean isSessionBlacklistingEnabled()
        Whether token blacklisting is enabled for stateless token deletion. Defaults to false.

      • getBlacklistCacheSize

        public int getBlacklistCacheSize()
        Maximum number of blacklisted tokens to cache in memory on each server. Beyond this number, tokens will be evicted from memory (but kept in the CTS) in a least-recently used (LRU) strategy. Defaults to 10000.

      • getBlacklistPollInterval

        public long getBlacklistPollInterval(TimeUnit unit)
        The interval at which to poll for changes to the token blacklist. May be 0 to indicate polling is disabled.
        Parameters:
        unit - the desired time unit for the poll interval.

      • getBlacklistPurgeDelay

        public long getBlacklistPurgeDelay(TimeUnit unit)
        Amount of time to keep tokens in the blacklist beyond their expiry time to account for clock skew.
        Parameters:
        unit - the desired time unit for the purge delay.
